title: We met in 2019
description: Joachim had a head start in coding, being the only one among them with prior experience. Meanwhile, Bartek and Dominik were both novices, taking their first steps into the world of software development. Their paths converged unexpectedly when Bartek and Joachim accidentally met Dominik on a Discord server, igniting a shared interest in coding and sparking a friendship that would shape their futures.

title: Guided by Experience
description: Embracing their newfound common ground, Joachim took on the role of a mentor, sharing his knowledge and guiding Bartek and Dominik as they embarked on their coding journey. Together, they delved into the vast realm of software development, exploring programming languages, algorithms, and problem-solving techniques.
